channel.title: 1PE on Quiet time notes

item.title: 1PE 4
item.description: 1PE 4:17 Those who didn’t have the mark faced judgement. Judgement started from the house of God Related verses: Ezekiel 9:6, 1 Peter 4:17. See notes

item.title: 1PE 2
item.description: 1PE 2:21 I am meant to follow in Christ footsteps Related verses: 1 PETER 2:21. See notes
